entry.summary: RT dhai.eth 🤠 📍 🇮🇩 Sneha is one of the few ppl who have contributed so much to D_D without even being a member. She's already set up multiple events including a new initiative @DDbuidlIRL. So happy that she's a member now! @developer_dao gang show her some love! ❤️ Sneha Mishra 💜 (🛠️, 🌈 ) 🏴‍☠️: ✨Developer DAO Appreciation Tweet✨ Thanks to the entire @developer_dao team and @dhaiwat10 for this beaut airdropped to my wallet🙈 Y'all makin me cry💜🥹 Super excited for the upcoming initiatives @DDbuidlIRL 🚀
